text: Kapena (jwambone ni) Ajula jwaalitesile litaka kuŵa lyakutamilichika, ni kuŵika nkatikati mwakwemo sulo, ni kuliŵichila matumbi gakunyichisya, ni kuŵika chakusiŵilila chilikati cha mbwani siŵili (ja mesi gachijete ni jamesi gakumweka)? Ana pana nnungu jwine pampepe ni Allah? (Ngwamba!) Nambo ŵajinji mwa ŵanganyao ŵangali chachimanyi
